thread.title: Gustavito, a beloved hippo in an El Salvador zoo, is murdered
thread.title_full: Gustavito, a beloved hippo in an El Salvador zoo, is murdered

author: David Strege
title: Gustavito, a beloved hippo in an El Salvador zoo, is murdered
text:
Gustavito, a beloved hippo in an El Salvador zoo, is murdered 
February 27, 2017 By David Strege 
The tragic death of a beloved hippopotamus named Gustavito proved that animals aren’t immune to the murderous environment of El Salvador, a country known for having one of the highest murder rates in the world. 
Gustavito, a 15-year-old hippo that was one of the National Zoological Park’s main attractions, died Sunday night from injuries it sustained in a brutal attack four nights before, according to CNN and the BBC . 
On Thursday, zoo staff members noticed Gustavito acting unusual, spending most of the day under water in its enclosure and not eating. 
The Ministry of Culture said in a statement that veterinarians determined Gustavito was suffering from “bruises, lacerations on the head and body, craps and abdominal pain.” La dolorosa muerte de Gustavito, el único hipopótamo de El Salvador que murió por un “cobarde e inhumano” ataque https://t.co/8vRRtJRY2Y pic.twitter.com/j6QWpLBuQ0 
— BBC Mundo (@bbcmundo) February 27, 2017 
The ministry said Gustavito suffered “multiple blows on different parts of the body” from “blunt and sharp objects” in Wednesday night’s attack. 
More from CNN : 
Zoo director Vladen Henríquez said Gustavito also had injuries to his feet and wounds on his cheek that could have been caused by an ice pick. 
“There were injuries inside his mouth,” Henríquez said, adding that they were probably inflicted “when the animal tried to defend himself.” 
Officials said they found pieces of metal and rocks inside the hippo’s enclosure. 
Veterinarians tended to Gustavito around the clock but could not save the popular hippo. A necropsy will be performed to determine the exact cause of death, and the zoo intends to double its security. 
Not surprisingly, news of the killing caused online shock and outrage. 
“Whoever did this has to pay,” Gigi Perla wrote in a tweet . “My heart goes out to you and your keepers; may you rest in peace. #Gustavito #ElSalvador”
